body.content:
# Getting Started with Object UI

Object UI is a **universal, schema-driven rendering engine** for React applications.

## Key Features

- üé® **Tailwind Native**: Complete control with utility classes
- üîå **Protocol Agnostic**: Works with any backend
- ‚öõÔ∏è **React First**: Modern hooks and patterns
- üì± **Responsive**: Mobile-first design

## Installation

```bash
npm install @object-ui/react @object-ui/components
```

## Quick Example

```tsx
import { SchemaRenderer } from '@object-ui/react';

const schema = {
  type: 'card',
  title: 'Hello World'
};

<SchemaRenderer schema={schema} />
```

## Learn More

Visit our [documentation](https://objectui.org) for detailed guides.

## Formatting Support

Markdown supports **bold**, *italic*, and ***bold italic*** text.

You can also add:

1. Numbered lists
2. With multiple items
3. In sequential order

Or bullet points:

- First item
- Second item
  - Nested item
  - Another nested item
- Third item

### Code Blocks

Inline `code` or full blocks:

```javascript
const greeting = 'Hello, Object UI!';
console.log(greeting);
```

### Links and More

Add [links](https://github.com/objectql/objectui) and create rich documentation.

> Blockquotes are great for highlighting important information or quotes.

---

Horizontal rules help separate content sections.

# Version 1.5.0

**Release Date:** February 1, 2024

## ‚ú® New Features

- Added Timeline component for chronological data
- Introduced Carousel for image galleries
- Enhanced Table component with sorting

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed form validation edge cases
- Resolved tooltip positioning issues
- Improved mobile responsiveness

## üìö Documentation

- Updated API reference
- Added more examples
- Improved getting started guide

## üéâ What's Next

Stay tuned for version 2.0 with:
- Advanced form builders
- Real-time collaboration
- Enhanced theming
